required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging-guided Focal Laser Ablation of Prostate Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: Magnetic resonance imaging-guided focal laser ablation of prostate cancer.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single-center, interventional treatment, non-randomized, open label, single arm, phase II study with a medical device.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion, 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate a change in the functional outcome urine incontinence before and after FLA in patients with localized low to intermediate risk prostate cancer (Gleason 3+3, 3+4 or Gleason 4+3).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion , 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the safety outcome local cancer control achieved at the ablation site after FLA by multiparametric MR imaging and targeted prostate biopsies.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion, 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate other functional outcomes (sexual, hormonal and bowel functions) before and after FLA in men with prostate cancer by using validated questionnaires e.g. International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS)

secondary_outcome.measure: Sexual Health Inventory for Men- International Index of Erectile Function (SHIM-IIEF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion, 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate other functional outcomes (sexual, hormonal and bowel functions) before and after FLA in men with prostate cancer by using validated questionnaires e.g. Sexual Health Inventory for Men- International Index of Erectile Function (SHIM-IIEF)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion, 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate other functional outcomes (sexual, hormonal and bowel functions) before and after FLA in men with prostate cancer by using validated questionnaires e.g. the International Consultation on Incontinence Questionnaire (ICIQ).

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of life using a validated quality of life questionnaire (EORTC QLQ PR25
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion , 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate quality of life before and after FLA in men with prostate cancer by using a validated quality of life questionnaire (EORTC QLQ PR25).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At inclusion , 3 months, 6 months, 12 months and 24 months follow up.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the complication rate related to the technique

arm_group.arm_group_label: Low or intermediate grade prostate cancer

intervention.arm_group_label: Low or intermediate grade prostate cancer

patient_data.ipd_description: The investigators will be author of submitted manuscripts in case they fulfill criteria for authorship according to regulations of scientific journals. After scientific publication of the results the study protocol, relevant data and findings will be made publically available for other centers to implement (parts) of this research into their standard clinical practice if they wish to do so.
